description:
Avengers Assemble! The best-selling
LEGO® Marvel videogame franchise
returns with a new action-packed,
Super Hero adventure. Join the 
LEGO® Marvel’s Avengers team and
experience the first console
videogame featuring characters and
storylines from the
critically-acclaimed film Marvel’s The
Avengers, the blockbuster sequel
Marvel’s Avengers: Age of Ultron, and
more. Play as the most powerful
Super Heroes in their quest to save
the world.
name: LEGO® Marvel Avengers
